entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 7:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning early this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
